subject: Re: [junit] No runnable methods exceptions using JUNIT 4.0 TestSuite with eclipse 3.2.1
msgSnippet: You are using a JUnit 3 style test suite in your AllTests class, but since you have JUnit 4 on the classpath, Eclipse is looking for a JUnit 4 style suite.
messageBody:
You are using a JUnit 3 style test suite in your AllTests class, but
since you have JUnit 4 on the classpath, Eclipse is looking for a JUnit
4 style suite.

Cheers, Ilja
